hero.description: I'm a Senior Frontend JavaScript developer with 6+ years of experience building reliable, scalable solutions. I thrive at the intersection of design and engineering—translating complex ideas into smooth, user-friendly interfaces.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Turning complex ideas into elegant interfaces
about.description1: I'm a Senior Frontend JavaScript developer with over 6 years of experience building reliable, scalable solutions. I thrive at the intersection of design and engineering—translating complex ideas into smooth, user-friendly interfaces using modern JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and related ecosystems.
about.description2: Currently working at S&P Global since 2023, I develop scalable, responsive web applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Redux, and Storybook. I build reusable UI components ensuring cross-browser compatibility using Bootstrap, Tailwind, MUI, and CSS-in-JS libraries.
about.description3: Previously, I worked at iPlex from 2019 to 2023 where I developed React-based applications focusing on performance, UX, and cross-platform compatibility. I created scalable, themable web applications for easy project replication.

card1.title: Frontend Development
card1.description: Building scalable, responsive web applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Redux.

card2.title: UI Components
card2.description: Creating reusable UI components with Bootstrap, Tailwind, MUI, and Ant CSS in JS libraries.

card3.title: User Experience
card3.description: Developing smooth, user-friendly interfaces that prioritize accessibility and performance.

card4.title: Testing & Optimization
card4.description: Implementing comprehensive testing and performance optimization using Jest, Cypress, and various tools.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your vision.
contact.contactInfoDescription: Feel free to contact me through any of the following methods or fill out the form. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Hello, I'd like to talk about...
contact.messageSentDescription: Thank you for reaching out. I'll get back to you as soon as possible!
